attributes.action: Get better treatment for mental health issues such as DBT
attributes.additional_details: Because these people deserve this treatment before they end their lives and because they are going through personal hell every day
attributes.background: Make sure that the treatment is available for these people so that they can live an ordinary life

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions calling for support for mental health to be improved, which you might like to sign:

Increase funding for crisis and acute mental health services: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/559871

Increase funding for NHS Adult Mental Health Services: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/316023

Increase support for children’s mental health during and after COVID-19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/318583

Review and improve support for people with mental health conditions: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/330968

Dialectical behaviour therapy (DBT) is already available on the NHS to treat some mental health problems. Deciding exactly what treatments to offer to individual patients is a clinical matter for the NHS.
